suite.name: Tasks

test.name: Read work item with attached file and add content as payload

kw.name: For Each Input Work Item
kw.arg: Read files and save content in payload
kw.doc: Run a keyword or function for each work item in the input queue.

kw.name: Read files and save content in payload
Get Work Item File
kw.doc: Get attached file from work item to disk. Returns the absolute path to the created file.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: ${content} = This is orders1.txt A file named orders.txt should be attached in the initial input work item

kw.name: Create Output Work Item
kw.doc: Create a new output work item.

kw.name: Set Work Item Variable
kw.doc: Set a single variable value in the current work item.
kw.msg: data = This is orders1.txt A file named orders.txt should be attached in the initial input work item

kw.name: Save Work Item
kw.doc: Save the current data and files in the work item. If not saved, all changes are discarded when the library goes out of scope.

kw.name: Read files and save content in payload
Get Work Item File
kw.doc: Get attached file from work item to disk. Returns the absolute path to the created file.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: ${content} = This is orders2.txt A file named orders.txt should be attached in the initial input work item

kw.name: Create Output Work Item
kw.doc: Create a new output work item.

kw.name: Set Work Item Variable
kw.doc: Set a single variable value in the current work item.
kw.msg: data = This is orders2.txt A file named orders.txt should be attached in the initial input work item

kw.name: Save Work Item
kw.doc: Save the current data and files in the work item. If not saved, all changes are discarded when the library goes out of scope.

kw.msg: @{contents} = [ This is orders1.txt A file named orders.txt should be attached in the initial input work item | This is orders2.txt A file named orders.txt should be attached in the initial input work item ]

kw.name: Log Many
kw.doc: Logs the given messages as separate entries using the INFO level.
kw.msg: This is orders1.txt A file named orders.txt should be attached in the initial input work item
This is orders2.txt A file named orders.txt should be attached in the initial input work item

suite.doc: Testing the helper keyword on consuming all work items in the queue.
